name: PRINCIPIA: Master of Science
summary: Principia:Master of Science is a simulation game with the theme of European science in 17th century. Player will choose one of real scientists in those era like Isaac Newton and proceed on the research. It's the time even the word "Science" didn't exist. Who can be the master of science?
info:
• 中文名: 科学溯源
  • 别名: プリンキピア：マスター・オブ・サイエンス

  • 平台: Mac
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: 模拟
  • 游玩人数: 单人游戏
